## Materials

-   Spill Paper
-   Scissors

## Solutions

-   xxx
-   xxx
-   xxx

## Procedure

1.  Remove old spill paper and place in trash (bring to solid waste if contaminated)
2.  Wipe where the spill paper used to be if there is any remaining residue and dispose of any contaminated substances
3.  Cut out appropriate-sized spill paper and set it flat on surface with the plastic surface of the spill paper facing down
4.  Tape the edges of the spill paper to the surface it lies on (try to keep the spill paper flat)
